titleStmt.title: Dauy Dycars dreame quod. T. Churcharde.
titleStmt.author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London in Aldersgate strete by Rycharde Lant,

notesStmt.note: First line begins: When faith in frendes beare fruit ...
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
